title: Girl, 14, killed as Russian strike hits Kharkiv playground
content: The strikes, which left at least six others dead, also hit a 12-storey building in the north-eastern city.

title: Nearly 40,000 people died home alone in Japan this year, report says

title: Germany resumes Afghan deportations after mass stabbing
